A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching this\, I have the feeling it's a parody of a star wars movie.\nIt reminded me of how penguins feed their chicks: Disney bought Star Wars franchise with intelligent\, brave and mature antagonists and protagonists ( just compare Darth Maul and Kylo Ren)\, digested it and cought back a new movie. On the good side you have much to laugh about .
